001.name: Heali Kiwi
001.description:
Itchy and dry scalp got you down? Our Heali Kiwi solid shampoo is here to help!

Chock full of oatmeal and a selection of ancient ayurvedic oils, our top-selling bar works a treat to help calm and nourish touchy scalps. As with all our shampoo bars, Heali Kiwi is 100% soap-free, pH-balanced and super gentle - yet wonderfully effective in washing your scalp woes away.
001.ingredients: sodium cocoyl isethionate, sodium coco-sulfate, decyl glucoside, stearic acid, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, glycerin, Avena sativa (oat) kernel meal, brassica alcohol, Citrus aurantifolia (lime) oil, lactic acid, caprylic/capric triglyceride, sodium isethionate, Azadirachta indica (neem) seed oil, Pongamia glabra (karanja) seed oil, behentrimonium methosulfate, limonene, citral, linalool

002.name: Frizz Wrangler
002.description:
Supremely smoothing without weighing your hair down, Frizz Wrangler is the go-to bar for those of you with beautiful curly hair - or hair that is subjected to hot tools and bleach and would happily accept a generous serving of hydration with a "thank you!".

Fair trade Samoan coconut oil and cocoa butter make an appearance in this delightfully coconutty bar for a shampoo that works as well at taming frizz as it smells divine. The result? Silky-smooth tresses that are frizz-free, full of life and easy to style.
002.ingredients: sodium cocoyl isethionate, sodium coco-sulfate, stearic acid, decyl glucoside, Cocos nucifera (coconut) fruit, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, brassica alcohol, lactic acid, caprylic/capric triglyceride, sodium isethionate, behentrimonium methosulfate, parfum, linalool

003.name: Pinkalicious
003.description:
Pinkalicious is pink to match the brand Ethique logo and smells delightfully like pink grapefruit and vanilla - it's the perfect addition to your beauty bar collection.

As usual organic, virgin, fair trade coconut oil and cocoa butter make an appearance, along with a host of other divine ingredients. Best for those with balanced hair and paired with our solid conditioner, Wonderbar.
003.ingredients: sodium cocoyl isethionate, sodium coco-sulfate, decyl glucoside, stearic acid, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, glycerin, Avena sativa (oat) kernel meal, brassica alcohol, Citrus aurantifolia (lime) oil, lactic acid, caprylic/capric triglyceride, sodium isethionate, Azadirachta indica (neem) seed oil, Pongamia glabra (karanja) seed oil, behentrimonium methosulfate, limonene, citral, linalool

004.name: St Clements
004.description:
If you struggle with oily hair then Saint Clements is for you.

There are no harsh 'stripping' surfactants (foaming agents) which just create more oil, nor is there any silicone.

We use Lime and Orange oils to balance oil production, clean the scalp and freshen your hair up. Leaves your hair perfect without the need for a conditioner as there are humectants in there which draw moisture to your hair, without the oil. Perfect!
004.ingredients: sodium coco-sulfate sodium cocoyl isethionate, decyl glucoside, stearic acid, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, glycerin, Ricinus communis (castor) seed oil, lactic acid, brassica alcohol, caprylic/capric triglyceride, sodium isethionate, Citrus aurantium dulcis (orange) peel oil, Citrus aurantifolia (lime) oil, behentrimonium methosulfate, mica, limonene, linalool, citral, CI 77891, CI 77861, CI 77492

005.name: Herbal Essences Coconut Milk
005.description:
Hydrating shampoo - helps hydrate damaged hair to smoothness to reveal it's natural beauty. Hair is softer & smoother.

Up to 2X more nourished hair vs. non-conditioning shampoo when using shampoo and conditioner
005.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, PEG-15 Cocopolyamine, PEG-200 Hydrogenated Glyceryl Palmate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Laureth-2, Sodium Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Trideceth-9, Parfum (Fragrance), PEG-5 Ethylhexanoate, Sodium Benzoate, Dipropylene Glycol, Basic Red 51, Basic Violet 2, Hexyl Cinnamal.

006.name: Passion Flower & Rice Milk
006.description:
Nourishing shampoo - deeply penetrates to nourish very dry hair and reveal its natural beauty. Hair is softer & smoother.

Up to 2X more nourished hair vs. non-conditioning shampoo when using shampoo and conditioner
006.ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Citrate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Stearyl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Parfum, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Salicylate, Polyquaternium-6, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Limonene, Sodium Hydroxide, Trihydroxystearin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Propylene Glycol, Histidine, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylene Glycol, Oryza Sativa Starch, Panthenol, Passiflora Incarnata Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glucose, Alcohol Denat., Lactic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Ecklonia Radiata Extract

007.name: Herbal Essences Argan Oil
007.description:
Repairing hair shampoo - helps repair damaged hair to smoothness to reveal it's natural beauty. Hair is softer & smoother.

Up to 2X more nourished hair vs. non-conditioning shampoo when using shampoo and conditioner

008.name: Micellar Water & Blue Ginger
008.description:
Gentle cleansing - micellar Water & Blue Ginger shampoo refreshes flat, limp hair by removing dirt and oils to reveal radiant locks.

Real botanicals endorsed by Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew
The real botanicals in this formula have been endorsed by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - a world-leading authority on plants.
008.ingredients: Water/eau, sodium laureth sulphate, sodium lauryl sulphate, sodium chloride, cocamidopropyl betaine, alpinia galanga rhizome extract, betula alba bark extract, histidine, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, ecklonia radiata extract, fragrance/parfum, sodium citrate, sodium xylenesulfonate, citric acid, sodium benzoate, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, tetrasodium EDTA, niacinamide, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylisothiazolinone

009.name: The Guardian
009.description:
The Guardian was created for those people who suffer from very dry, very damaged or frizzy hair.

Containing lots of cocoa butter, coconut oil, vitamin B5 and zesty lime oil it will tame your frizz, hydrate dry hair and make your hair look smooth and lush (it won't repair your hair, it is impossible to repair something that is dead.) The Guardian can also be used as a shaving bar or an in-shower moisturiser.
009.ingredients: behentrimonium methosulfate, brassica alcohol, hydrogenated castor oil, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, stearic acid, glycerin, panthenol, caprylic/capric triglyceride, Citrus aurantifolia (lime) oil, benzyl alcohol, mica, limonene, dehydroacetic acid, aqua (water), citral, linalool, titanium dioxide, CI 77288

010.name: In The Buff
010.description:
The ultimate, scent-free conditioner for your hair care routine. Free from fragrance & coconut oil to soothe and smooth your scalp! We’re talking fair-trade, less-allergenic babassu oil, THC-free hemp oil and cocoa butter to nourish your hair without weighing it down. Guar – made from a kind of bean – helps smooth the hair and adds a protective layer. To bind it all together, we’ve used brassica alcohol. This is a great alternative to palm-derived co-emulsifiers, is non-drying and derived from brassica (which is in the same family as broccoli).

Free from fragrance & coconut oil – just luscious locks and a scalp that will love you forever.
010.ingredients: behentrimonium methosulfate, brassica alcohol, Euphorbia cerifera cera (candelilla wax), Theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, Orbignya oleifera (babassu) seed oil, glycerin, jojoba esters, stearic acid, Cannabis sativa (hemp) seed oil, tridecane, undecane, guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, benzyl alcohol, mica, dehydroacetic acid, aqua (water), tocopherol, titanium dioxide, CI 77491

011.name: Untangled
011.description:
Curly-wurlys or super-fine fly-aways – whatever makes your little one’s hair hard to handle, this is the answer.

Tame the tangle with our new conditioner for little ones, containing cocoa butter, coconut oil and mandarin.

Also doubles as a non-foaming all-over wash for super sensitive skin.
011.ingredients: stearyl alcohol, cetyl alcohol, behentrimonium methosulfate, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, vegetable glycerine, Citrus reticulata (mandarin) essential oil, benzyl alcohol, dehydroacetic acid

012.name: Tone it down
012.description: Goodbye brass! To bring out the brightness in blonde and silver hair, this purple conditioning bar (great for blondes and silver foxes) is best used as your regular conditioner – it doesn’t contain petrochemical-derived dyes so the toning is more gentle than typical purple products. Jasmine oil delivers deep nourishment for soft, smooth, luminous locks.
012.ingredients: cetyl alcohol, stearyl alcohol, behentrimonium methosulfate, Cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, mica, Theobroma cacao (cocoa) butter, vegetable glycerine, Caprylic/capric triglyceride, benzyl alcohol, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Jasminum grandiflorum (jasmine) essential oil, dehydroacetic acid, natural fragrance, beta vulgaris (beetroot) extract, benzyl benzoate, linalool, eugenol

013.name: Pure Aloe & Mango
013.description:
Herbal Essences Pure Aloe & Mango sulphate-free* conditioner helps to protect the colour of your hair, all the while giving it a silky shine.

The real botanicals in this formula have been endorsed by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew – a world-leading authority on plants.
013.ingredients: Aqua, stearyl alcohol, cetyl alcohol, stearamidopropyl dimethylamine, bis-aminopropyl dimethicone, fragrance/parfum, benzyl alcohol, dicetyldimonium chloride, glutamic acid, sodium benzoate, propylene glycol, citric acid, disodium EDTA, limonene, histidine, hexyl cinnamal, linalool, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, butylene glycol, rubus fruticosus fruit extract, persea gratissima fruit extract, mangifera indica fruit extract, alcohol denat., ecklonia radiata extract

014.name: Pure Aloe & Bamboo
014.description:
Herbal Essences Pure Aloe & Bamboo sulphate-free* conditioner strengthens and deeply moisturises hair.

The real botanicals in this formula have been endorsed by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - a world-leading authority on plants.
014.ingredients: aqua, stearyl alcohol, bis-aminopropyl dimethicone, behentrimonium chloride, cetyl alcohol, isopropyl alcohol, phenoxyethanol, benzyl alcohol, fragrance/parfum, sodium benzoate, disodium EDTA, benzyl salicylate, citric acid, hexyl cinnamal, histidine, limonene, propylene glycol, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, polysorbate 20, geraniol, butylene glycol, bambusa vulgaris shoot extract, alcohol denat., lactic acid, vitis vinifera seed extract, potassium sorbate, ecklonia radiata extract

015.name: White Grapefruit & Mosa Mint
015.description:
Revives dull hair shine & reveal its natural beauty. Hair is softer & smoother.

Up to 2X more nourished hair vs. non-conditioning shampoo when using shampoo and conditioner

Real plant esences - Shampoo infused with real White Grapefruit and Aloe.

016.name: White Strawberry & Sweet Mint
016.description:
Purifies roots & hydrate lengths, revealing hair's natural beauty. Hair is softer & smoother.

Up to 2X more nourished hair vs. non-conditioning shampoo when using shampoo and conditioner

Real plant esences - Conditioner infused with real Strawberry, Mint and Aloe.

017.name: Matcha, Lime & Lemongrass
017.description:
Not only does solid bodywash use less packaging and require less water to produce, they are also one of the easiest eco swaps to make. Like all Ethique products, our bodywashes are made of biodegradable, sustainably sourced, naturally-derived and palm oil free ingredients. Does this impact the effectiveness of the wash? No way! Our bars are still deliciously bubbly and non-drying and we just know you’ll love them.

We love fresh, citrus-y scents and this one fits the bill. Lime oil, lemongrass oil and lashings of matcha tea powder make this the perfect morning shower bar.
017.ingredients: Sodium olivate, sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, aqua (water), vegetable glycerine, sodium chloride, Citrus aurantifolia (lime) essential oil, mica, Cymbopogon schoenanthus (Lemongrass) oil, Camellia sinensis leaf extract (matcha powder), Tetrasodium glutamate diacetate, citral, limonene

018.name: Pumice, Tea Tree & Spearmint
018.description:
Not only does solid bodywash use less packaging and require less water to produce, they are also one of the easiest eco swaps to make. Like all Ethique products, our bodywashes are made of biodegradable, sustainably sourced, naturally-derived and palm oil free ingredients. Does this impact the effectiveness of the wash? No way! Our bars are still deliciously bubbly and non-drying and we just know you’ll love them.

This bar is our bestseller, particularly popular with those of you who like a bit of exfoliation and a bit of charcoal to truly feel clean. Pumice scrubs, charcoal cleanses and tea tree, spearmint and ginger oils smell fab.
018.ingredients: sodium olivate, sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, aqua (water), vegetable glycerine, sodium chloride, activated charcoal, pumice, Mentha spicata (spearmint) oil, Zingiber officinale (ginger) essential oil, Melaleuca alternifolia (teatree) oil, Tetrasodium glutamate diacetate, citral, limonene

019.name: Charcoal, Kaolin & Oatmeal
019.description:
Not only does solid bodywash use less packaging and require less water to produce, they are also one of the easiest eco swaps to make. Like all Ethique products, our bodywashes are made of biodegradable, sustainably sourced, naturally-derived and palm oil free ingredients. Does this impact the effectiveness of the wash? No way! Our bars are still deliciously bubbly and non-drying and we just know you’ll love them.

Made with oatmeal to soothe and kaolin & charcoal for a gentle cleanse and left unscented which is great for those with sensitive skin.
019.ingredients: sodium olivate, sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, aqua (water), vegetable glycerine, sodium chloride, kaolin clay, ground oatmeal, activated charcoal, Tetrasodium glutamate diacetate

020.name: Sweet Orange & Vanilla
020.description:
Not only does solid bodywash use less packaging and require less water to produce, they are also one of the easiest eco swaps to make. Like all Ethique products, our bodywashes are made of biodegradable, sustainably sourced, naturally-derived and palm oil free ingredients. Does this impact the effectiveness of the wash? No way! Our bars are still deliciously bubbly and non-drying and we just know you’ll love them.

This one is for those of you with a sweet tooth. Vanilla is creamy, sweet and delicious, with a hit of sweet orange oil to lighten it up, but never overpower it.
020.ingredients: sodium olivate, sodium cocoate, sodium stearate, aqua (water), vegetable glycerine, sodium chloride, natural fragrance, Citrus aurantium dulcis (sweet orange) essential oil, mica, Tetrasodium glutamate diacetate, citral, limonene

021.name: Purely Pampering Shea Butter with Warm Vanilla
021.description:
What makes truly pampering skin care? We believe it’s the promise of softer, more moisturized skin combined with small moments of self-care. Our Pampering Body Wash with shea butter and warm vanilla scent does just that: blending  naturally-derived cleansers and plant-based moisturizer in a lather that nourishes skin in just one shower.

For nourishing care, we’ve added our Microbiome Nutrient Serum – a unique blend of prebiotics that nourishes your skin’s microbiome and helps strengthen its natural moisture barrier.
021.ingredients: Water (Eau), Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Sodium Methyl Lauroyl Taurate, Sodium Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lauric Acid, Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Glycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Hydroxystearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Undecylenoyl Glycine, Capryloyl Glycine, Citric Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Red 33(CI 17200), Yellow 5(CI 19140)

022.name: Winter Care
022.description:
Winter can be tough on our skin – the cold air can make it easier for it to dry out, leaving us with parched, rough and cracked skin. Care for your skin by choosing Dove Winter Care Body Wash, a moisturizing body wash that instantly relieves dry skin in just one shower. 

Specially formulated for dry winter skin, Dove Winter Care Body Wash is made with skin-natural nutrients, naturally-derived cleansers and a plant-based moisturizer. The mild, sulfate-free formula is microbiome gentle and transforms into a creamy nourishing lather you’ll love to use on cold winter mornings.

This moisturizing body wash is infused with Microbiome Nutrient Serum – a unique blend of prebiotics that nourishes your skin and its microbiome – its living protective layer – and helps strengthen skin’s natural moisture barrier.
022.ingredients: Water (Eau), Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Sodium Methyl Lauroyl Taurate, Sodium Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lauric Acid, Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Glycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Hydroxystearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Undecylenoyl Glycine, Capryloyl Glycine, Citric Acid, Sodium Gluconate, Alpha Isomethyl Ionone, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool

023.name: Summer Care with Grapefruit and Lemon Balm
023.description:
Seeing dry skin in summer? If heat, chlorine and humidity leaves your skin feeling tight or uncomfortable, try a nourishing summer skin care routine with Dove Summer Care Body Wash.

Keeping skin moisturized in summer starts with a refreshing body wash. Dove Summer Body Wash gently cleanses and moisturizes skin, leaving it looking smooth and glowing. The refreshing scent of grapefruit and lemon will add a dose of sunshine to every day. 

Dove Summer Body Wash is infused with Microbiome Nutrient Serum – a unique blend of prebiotics that nourishes your skin’s microbiome, and helps strengthen skin’s natural moisture barrier. Its mild formula with skin-natural nourishers and plant-based cleansers makes this a microbiome gentle body wash.
023.ingredients:
Water (Eau), Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Methyl Lauroyl Taurate, Sodium Benzoate, Glycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Stearic Acid, 
Palmitic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Glycol Distearate, Hydroxystearic Acid, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Melissa Officinalis Extract, Lauric Acid, Carrageenan, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Undecylenoyl Glycine, Capryloyl Glycine, Sodium gluconate, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Blue 1 (CI 42090), Red 33 (CI 17200), Yellow 5 (CI 19140)

024.name: Renewing Body Wash with Peony and Rose Oil
024.description:
Does radiant, dewy skin feel out of reach? Not anymore – it’s just a shower away. Combining the scent of peony and rose oil with the care of Dove, our Renewing Body Wash revives skin leaving it dewy and supple in just one shower.
 
Formulated with naturally-derived cleansers and plant-based moisturizer, this hydrating body wash blends gentle cleansing with moisturization to create instant softness. The nourishing formula includes Dove Microbiome Nutrient Serum – a unique blend of prebiotics that nourishes your skin's microbiome – its living protective layer, and helps strengthen skin’s natural moisture barrier. The light, floral scent helps you feel fresh and radiant from head to toe.
024.ingredients: Water (Eau), Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Glycinate, Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Acrylates Copolymer, Lauric Acid, Glycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Hydroxystearic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Paeonia Officinalis Flower Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Glycol Distearate, Tetrasodium EDTA, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, PPG-2 Hydroxyethyl Cocamide, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Citric Acid, Citronellol, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Red 33 (CI 17200), Yellow 5 (CI 19140)

025.name: Coconut Fragranced Bath Bubble
025.description:
Bring on the bubbles with our fun and fragrant Coconut Bath Bubble. It turns your tub into an exotic paradise with an explosion of blue and the gourmand, creamy scent of coconuts.

Heart-shaped bath bubble
Creamy coconut scent
Colour your bath water blue

026.name: Pink Grapefruit Fragranced Bath Bubble
026.description:
Bring on the bubbles with our fun and fragrant Pink Grapefruit Bath Bubble. It turns your tub into a fresh, juicy treat with an explosion of pretty pink and the scent of zesty, citrusy pink grapefruits.

Heart-shaped bath bubble
Citrusy pink grapefruit scent
Color your bath water pink
Pick and mix bath treats

027.name: Moringa Fragranced Bath Bubble
027.description:
Bring on the bubbles with our fun and fragrant Moringa Bath Bubble. It turns your tub into a floral meadow with an explosion of soft yellow and the fresh, soothing scent of moringa.

Heart-shaped bath bubble

028.name: Banana Bath Blend
028.description: Give your bath time a boost with our deliciously-scented, velvety Bath Blends. More than your average bath soak, we’ve blended super fruits and vegetables rich in vitamins and antioxidants that make your skin look healthier. Our Banana Bath Blend leaves dry skin feeling hydrated, nourished and comforted.  Best of all, notes of banana, watermelon, strawberry and vanilla ice cream leave your skin sweetly scented.  Self-care never smelled so good. Lock the door, queue up a playlist and enjoy.

031.description: Give your bath time a boost with our deliciously-scented, velvety Bath Blends. More than your average bath soak, we’ve blended super fruits and vegetables rich in vitamins and antioxidants that make your skin look healthier. Our Pear Bath Blend leaves dry skin feeling hydrated, nourished and comforted.  Best of all, notes of green apple, kale, pear & rose leave your skin sweetly scented. Self-care never smelled so good. Lock the door, queue up a playlist and enjoy.
031.ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil/Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Parfum/Fragrance, Coco-Glucoside, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sesamum Indicum Seed Oil/Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Benzoate, Actinidia Chinensis Seed Oil/Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Seed Oil, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Linalool, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Pyrus Communis Fruit Extract/Pyrus Communis (Pear) Fruit Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Denatonium Benzoate, Brassica Oleracea Acephala Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, CI 15985/Yellow 6, CI 19140/Yellow 5, CI 42090/Blue 1

032.name: Gentle Shampoo
032.description: My tear free Kylie Baby Gentle Shampoo cleanses and softens hair and is suitable for delicate hair and sensitive scalp. The moisture-rich formula delivers a creamy lather to cleanse hair without drying it out, and is ideal for babies and kids of all ages. This dreamy shampoo works wonders for all types of hair and leaves hair soft and shiny.
032.ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Sodium Methyl Oleoyl Taurate, Phenoxyethanol, Coco-Glucoside, Lauryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Camellia Oleiferaseed Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Fragaria Ananassa (Strawberry) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil

033.name: Gentle Conditioner
033.description: My Kylie Baby Gentle Conditioner eases combing, enhances curls and helps detangle all hair types and textures, leaving your baby's hair silky smooth. This tear free conditioner is formulated with Murumuru Butter, Glycerin and caring botanical oils to take extra care of babies' and kids' hair and delivers gentle yet effective conditioning. Suitable for delicate hair and sensitive scalp, it is ideal for babies and kids of all ages.
033.ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Behentrimonium Chloride, Lauryl Laurate, Glycol Distearate, Phenoxyethanol, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Isopropyl Alcohol, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Cocoglucosides Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Lactic Acid, Sodium Chloride, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Bambusa Vulgaris Leaf/Stem Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate

034.name: Bubble Bath
034.description: My mild Kylie Baby Bubble Bath fills the bath tub with tear free bubbles, while gently cleansing from head to toe. This formula is suitable for sensitive skin and ideal for babies and kids of all ages. For happy, clean bath time fun!
034.ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Laurylglucosides Hydroxypropylsulfonate, Coco-Glucoside, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glyceryl Caprylate, Sodium Chloride, Gluconolactone, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Calcium Gluconate, Sodium Hydroxide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol
